name: Party Crushers
description:
Please fill out this form after playing. Thank you! :) https://forms.gle/SLSB3xfUdWSWXZYW9

You have received multiple noise complaints. There appears to be a party in the catacombs! You must go down there and put an end to this excessive noise.

Controls:

WASD - movement
R - reload
LMB - shoot
RMB - aim
Q - drop weapon
E - pickup weapon
